cgcloud__User_Document_Template_Activity.name: cgcloud__User_Document_Template_Activity__c
cgcloud__User_Document_Template_Activity.description: Stores the details of the relationship between the daily report template and user activity.

cgcloud__Max_Hours__c.description: Maximal number of hours that's allowed for an activity.

cgcloud__Record_Link__c.description: Link to the detail page of the user document template activity record.

cgcloud__Unique_Activity__c.description: Technical field that verifies whether an activity is added only once to a daily report template.

cgcloud__User_Document_Template__c.description: Reference to the user document template.
